tests.name: Make the sun set
tests.description_html: Animate the sun and the sky to make it look like the sun is setting.

checks.name: getCircleAt(50, 11, 5.2)
checks.error_html: The sun seems wrong near the beginning.

checks.name: getCircleAt(50, 20, 7)
checks.error_html: The sun seems wrong near the middle.

checks.name: getCircleAt(50, 109, 24.8)
checks.error_html: The sun seems wrong near the end.

checks.name: checkUniqueColoredRectangles(10)
checks.error_html: The sky doesn't seem to be changing color

checks.name: checkUniqueColoredCircles(10)
checks.error_html: The sun doesn't seem to be changing color
